string.value: You don't appear to be in any games right now...
{0} has started a game! use /join to enter Fairview, and look at those Tommy guns.
A new game has been started by {0}! Use /join to join the action, Mafia-style!
{0} has started a chaos game! use /join to enter Fairview, and look at those Tommy guns.
A new chaos game has been started by {0}! Use /join to join the action, Mafia-style!
You can't join now! The game is already running.
You've already joined!
1 minute left to /join
{0} seconds left to /join
Not enough players, cancelling game!
Game is starting, please wait while I assign roles and update the database.
{0} is banned for attempting an exploit (no names starting with /)
{0}, please change your name to join
Sorry, max player limit has been reached!
{0} has joined the game. {1} players, {2} minimum, {3} max
{0} click this: @{1}, then click start. Until you do, you won't be able to play.
You can't run away! You're already out of town! Where do you want to go anyway?
{0} has fled in terror!
{0} players remain.
Take a breath! I didn't ask you anything yet!
You don't seem to be playing...
I can't find a player by that name!
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to do something to {1}
{0} has voted to exile {1}
{0} has not voted 2 nights in a row. The Fed's storm {0}'s house, finding them vanished myteriously. {1}
Your friends in the force has already been dead or missing. Now's your turn to carry the torch and save this city from Mafias!
Choice accepted
\nYour "personal advisor" is {0}.
{0} is arrested! You decided to take up their mantle. After all, you've watched them extracting information over and over again. You know you can do it.
{0} the torture chamber guard takes intiative to serve you in {1}'s death. You're happy, and promote them into your new "personal advisor"!
After a long session, you've learnt that {0} is {1}! Well, they won't miss a relative or two, right?
Who do you want to exile from the town?
Whose information do you want to know? Discreetly, of course.
Who do you think will make a scoop so big they'll leave the city? Your newspaper has {0} more opening.
Who do you want to deliver the contraband to?
Whose relative do you want to "extract information" from?
Who do you want to make safer tonight?
Who do you want to arrest?
Who will meet your bullet?
Who is your role model?
Who do you want to convert to the Church of Happyology?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and
You are a Repentant Mafia 😾. You've been afraid with your criminal life's consequences, and ready to leave them for good whenever the cops come for you.
You are the Mafia Stalker 🕵. During the day, you may stalk a player to reveal their true allegiance. But there is a 40% chance the cops will find you stalking around them!
You are a Corrupt Politician 🍻! However corrupt you are, the town will honor you a night of mourning for your or your family's death.
You are the Bouncer 👼. Every night, you can guard a citizen's house. But if you choose to guard a cop's house, there's a 50% chance you'll be arrested.
You are the Paparazzi 🔫! You can't resist a big scoop. However, your headliner newspiece can force anybody to leave the city in shame.

You are the Middleman 💋! Your only job is to deliver these contrabands. Be careful for the cops, if they spotted you in front of their houses or the house they raid on, you'll be arrested too. They won't find you in your house though.
You are the Double Agent 🖕. You lay low to hide your true allegiance, but if your cop friends are dead or missing, you'll be sure finish the job!
You are a Police Officer 🐺. You vow to get rid of mafia in your beloved neighborhood, one scum at a time. Each night you can choose to arrest someone.
You are the Torture Technician 👳. Your job is to "extract information" about a citizen's true allegiance, without them knowing, of course.
You are a Mafia Soldier 👱! Do your best protecting the Godfather from the cops!
You are the Suicide Bomber 👺. When the city gives up on you, you'll also give up on the city, and detonate the bomb you planted everywhere.
You are the Idealist 👶. You never lose hope on human nature, even if your parent dies. In fact, if that happens, you'll join the police force and eradicate evil!
You are the Consigliere 👁, Godfather's right hand man. You employ a "personal advisor" to "extract information". That's the Torture Technician!
You are the Torture Chamber Host 🙇. You never "extract information" by yourself, but if the Technician is nowhere to be found, you will be hired to do their job as well!
Welcome to the Church of Happyology 👤! You only wants everyone, mafia or not, chill and worship your deity. Now go convert those poor sad people out there!
You are the IRS Officer 💂. You're informed that the Church of Happyology are embezzling tax from the City. Go arrest those creepy religious member!
It's starting to get dark. As the citizen gathers, they pick one person to exile from the city... Everyone now has {0} seconds to vote!
It is now day time. All of you have {0} seconds to make your accusations / defenses / talk.
Night has fallen. Everyone heads to bed, weary after another stressful day. Night players: you have {0} seconds use your actions!
The citizens have cast their votes, amid doubts and suspicions. {0} is exiled. {1}
"Why can't we unite?", murmur one guy. The city's split on who's to exile, and as the result, no one is exiled.
Something is fishy, for no one voted! No exile tonight.....
The Newspaper just come in! {0} is caught arrested by the police. Their Stalker days are over.
The Newspaper just come in! It seems that {0} the Bouncer-for-Hire is arrested on jaywalking charges. They're behind bars now.
The Newspaper just come in! Their staff, {0}, is arrested for peeping on the cops locker room. What are they looking for there?
The Newspaper just come in! {0} is arrested for assault and kidnapping charge. They can't "extract information" anymore. The Torture Technician 👳 is arrested.
The Newspaper just come in! {0} the corrupt politician's spouse was found dead in their house. Tonight, every member of the cops will guard at their funeral.
The Newspaper just come in! It seems that {0} was caught for libel, slander, and generally every lie ever made. They can't Gossip about someone's true allegiance anymore.
The Newspaper just come in! They reported that {0} was arrested by the police for being in Mafia business! {1}
The Newspaper just come in! A member of the Church of Happyology, {0}, was arrested by federal officers. It seems they are embezzling money from the City.
All was calm the previous night, no sound of police raid or anything whatsoever.
The cops came and tried to arrest you, but you offer them your cooperation for taking down the mafia! You are their comrades now.
Your comrades are now: {0}
It seems that the Repentant Mafia joins you as a comrade: {0}!
BANG! BANG! BANG! OPEN UP! THIS IS A POLICE RAID!
Uh oh, a cop shot {0} in the raid! There will be a funeral tomorrow night, you won't be able to do raids.
What are you doing, hanging about a police's house? You are arrested!
You have saved {0} from the cops. Guess that truck full of guns help, huh?
After a long, eventless night standing guard in front of {0}'s house from your arsenal truck, you head home and try to catch a quick nap.
{0} wasn't home!
The Bouncer decided to drop by your home last night, and scared the cops from raiding your house.
The Newspaper just come in! Headline: {0} stays home with truckload of illegal guns and counterfeit money! They are the Middleman.
{0} wasn't home!
{0} was a cop! What were you thinking, going to a police's house with illegal firearms?
The Newspaper just come in! {0} visited a police with counterfeit money, arrested immediately!
The Newspaper just come in! {0} visited {1}'s house to complete a transaction. However, the cops were raiding their house. {0} is arrested for illegal firearms possession.
The transaction with {0} was a success! You went back with a lighter truck and a heavier wallet.
The Middleman comes with your goods. You pay them a hefty sum and quickly sends them on their way.
You caught {0} snooping about! They are the Stalker.
Like a true Stalker, you now know that {0} is {1}!
It seems that {0} the Paparazzi got the short end of a deal. He wrote an expose on {1} and got revenge. {1} was swiftly arrested.
The Newspaper just come in! HEADLINE: COMPROMISING PHOTOS OF {1}! Writer: {0}. They seems very embarassed and take the first bus out of Fairview! {2}
The police has won! Fairview is free from corrupt mafias!
The polices have won! Fairview is free from corrupt mafias!
The mafias have won! With no pesky do-gooder cop, it's mafia stronghold here.
Oh no! You choose to exile the Suicide Bomber! "It's not about me, it's about sending a message." He detonates himself and several bombs in the city!
Remaining living players, roles, and team:
{0} has voted to convert {1} to the Church of Happyology.
{0} was sent to {1}'s house to convert and offer them "tax evasion" plan. However, they were IRS Agent! {0} was arrested for tax embezzlement.
{0} was arrested for trying to offer you a "tax evasion" plan. Your informant says that {1} church member remain
Welcome to the Church of Happyology! Forget about the Mafia, this church will help you. Every night, you have the opportunity to offer the same fellowship to other players.
Fellow member of the Church: {0}
You welcome {0} to the Church!
{0} went to {1}'s house, but they weren't home!
All the cops are gone, and Fairview is now a haven for the Church of Happyology!
You try to arrest {0}, but they are already jailed!
You go to {0} in the middle of the night, just to find their Church of Happyology membership card. You arrest them immediately.
You go to {0} in the middle of the night, and after several rough questions, you believe that they aren't involved with the Church of Happyology. You leave immediately.
{0}'s parents just died! For their bravery, they are employed by the police temporarily.
{0} has died. Determined to get revenge, you persuade the police chief into employing you. Your new teammates are: {1}
a Mafia Soldier 👱
the Politician 🍻
the Middleman 💋
the Torture Technician 👳
the Double Agent 🖕
the Bouncer 👼
the Stalker 🕵
a Police Officer 🐺
a Repentant Mafia 😾
the Paparazzi 🔫
the Suicide Bomber 👺
the Gossip 🃏
the Idealist 👶
the Consigliere 👁
the Torture Chamber Host 🙇
a Church of Happyology Member 👤
the IRS Agent 💂
Ran Away
💀 Out of Town
🙂 Alive
Players Alive
a Caporegime 👷
You are a Caporegime 👷, a Mafia Captain! You are the only ones at mafia meeting, so you know other Capo as well.
The Newspaper just come in! One of the Capo, {0}, was arrested for accomplice to mafia activities.
The other Caporegimes at your meeting with the Godfather are {0}
{0} is trying to convert a new prospective member, but they find a police raid was happening on their house...
The polices are trying to raid {0}'s house, but find that the Bouncer and their arsenal are blocking the way. Didn't want to risk a full-blown firefight, the cops retreated.
{0} try to convert {1} to the Church, but they were dismissed as "child's play"!
@{1}, a player with the name {0} has already joined. Please change your name to join.
You deliver some documents to {0}'s house! Your curiosity wins out, and you peek into the envelope. There was a letter from the Head of the Church of Happyology!
was
The Newspaper just come in! It seems that {0} is seen leaving the town hastily last night. You wonder what happened.
The Newspaper just come in! It seems that the city is mounting a search mission for {0}, who has not been seen since last night.
That's strange, {0} misses their meeting with the Godfather last night.
Fleeing while the game is running has been disabled by the group admin!
left town.
{0} added to admin list. Use /config to change group settings.
You are already in a game! ({0})
Your group has managed to start multiple games... Killing extras.
Your group is currently in the queue. Position: {0} / {1}
Sorry, I'm about to start a short maintenance break, you can't start a game right now.\nWaiting on {0} games to end...\nGo to @werewolfdev for more information
Sorry, max concurrent games has been reached ({0}). \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
{0} is a preferred group, and has skipped the queue!
There is no game running. Start a new game with /startgame or start a chaos game with /startchaos
Only a group admin can run this command.
After this game, I am shutting down for maintenance.
After this game, I am shutting down momentarily for an update (automated).
UserId was null. Are you sure you sent this as a reply?
{0} is already an admin!
{0} is not an admin!
{0} removed from admin list.
Language set to {0}
Time's up!
You are a Pastor 🏹, the witness of an (un)holy matrimony and true love. As wedded spouse, the two before you will not leave one's side, in shame or in jail.

You are an ID Thief 🎭. Starting as a simple pickpocket, you realize that you can easily fool the city into tricking that you are the person in any identity card you have. Of course, you can only use the identity when the original is not in town.

You are the Construction Worker 🎯. You look like nothing special, but you know every weakness in every building in the city. The policeman will be incapacitated if they try to raid your trap-laden house. If you're forced to leave the city, someone's house will pay.
You are the Kidnapper 🔪. Kidnapping people without demanding any ransom, you do this every night just for giggles. Throw a people in your dungeon every night!
You wed {0} in the city's Church. You will not leave each other's side, in jail or in shame.
The city elect to exile you! Whose house will you demolish out of retaliation?
{0} was exiled. In their way out of city, you saw them pushing a button. But nothing happens.
{0} was exiled. In their way out of city, you saw them trying to push a button, but it seems that they don't have enough courage to do that.
{0} was exiled. In their way out of city, you saw them pushing a button, and then you heard an explosion! It seems that {1}'s house was reduced to rubble. {1} left the city. {2}
The Paparazzi has written an expose on your frauds! Before you leave the city in shame, you have the power to reduce someone's house to ruins. Choose, quick!
The expose on {0} was too much, he left the city without any retaliation.
{0} left the city in shame. In their way out of city, you saw them trying to push a button, but it seems that they don't have enough courage to do that.
{0} left the city in shame. In their way out of city, you saw them pushing a button, and then you heard an explosion! It seems that {1}'s house was reduced to rubble. {1} left the city. {2}
{0} went to try to convert {1}, but he hasn't been heard since! It's like they are kidnapped and disappear from the face of the earth!
The policemen try to raid the Construction Worker's house, but before he can be arrested, an officer fell into a trap door and has to be hospitalized! {0} is incapacitated.
The policemen try to raid the Construction Worker's house, but an officer fell into a trap door and has to be hospitalized! {0} is incapacitated.
The police raided a house last night, but now {0} hasn't been seen since! It's like they are kidnapped and disappear from the face of the earth!
The Newspaper just come in! On page 8: Mysterious Disappearance of {0}. The Kidnapper takes another one for his collection! {1}
You try to induct {0} to your collection, but on the way you see the Bouncer and his Mobile Arsenal. You hastily retreated for the night.
The Church of Happyology sent {0} to {1}'s house! Unfortunately, when the bell is rung, a trap door swallowed {0}! {0} is missing...
The Church of Happyology sent {0} to {1}'s house! {1} seemed nice enough until they shoved and locked {0} to the freezer room! {0} is missing...
You stand guard in front of the kidnapper's house, but after a sweet smell and a whack, you lose consciousness. You have been kidnapped!
You went to deliver some chemical to {0}'s house, just for him to force a handkerchief soaked in it to your nose! You delivered the goods to the Kidnapper, and now you're deemed missing!
don't worry about this string for now!
The ID theft shows up to the meeting with the Godfather! {0} is now a Caporegime!
{0} is not in the city anymore! You begin to modify the ID to be received as a Capo. Your fellow Capos (if any) are: {1}
The ID theft shows up to the Church of Happyology meeting! {0} is now a member of the Church!
{0} is not in the city anymore! You begin to modify the ID to be received as a Church Member. Your fellow members (if any) are: {1}
You saw {0} in the morning briefing, acting like a veteran police. It seems that {0} is a new police member!
{0} is not in the city anymore! You begin to modify the ID to be received as a Police Officer. Your fellow police officers (if any) are: {1}
The Newspapers just come in! Fairview open a museum of wax statue of recent citizens! The Kidnapper have won!
Who do you want to add to your collection tonight?
With {0}'s disappearance, it seems that {1} their spouse also follows suit. They go together, just like a good couple should be. {2}
Whose identity do you want to pickpocket?
Who did swear eternal love in front of you? Choose the first player!
Who did swear eternal love in front of you? Choose the last player!
the Construction Worker 🎯
Pastor 🏹
the Kidnapper 🔪
the ID Thief 🎭
You swore your eternal love to {0}, for better, for worse, in health and in sickness. If they have to leave the city, you will also follow. If you survives until the end, you will both win.
You take the identity of an Idealist. Your parent is {0}.
True love endures! The lovers have won!
The Newspaper just come in! {0} is lost, their last message said that they were going to the Construction Worker's house! {1}
A member of the Church of Happyology tried to fold you to their midst, but you dismiss them as a silly group.
You are already on the wait list for {0}
You have been added to the wait list for {0}. I will PM you when the next game is starting.
A new game is starting in {0}

Morning comes, and the remaining two citizen walk out to the town square. {0} takes a look at {1}, apparently mumbling about how The Thinker's pose will be perfect for them. {0} then drags {1} into the dungeon.
The city lost all of its citizen, now even more eerie than the scariest ghost town...

As the sun rises, {0} and {1} walk out into the ton square. {0} drags {1} to their dungeon, but {1} managed to demolish it from within. The crumbling sounds is the last sound of the city, nobody wins...
You failed to make a choice, so the moderator has chosen for you: {0}
